raw_infobox.name: Dirk Nowitzki
raw_infobox.image: Dirk Nowitzki - 2019202181209 2019-07-21 Champions for Charity - 1829 - B70I1864.jpg
raw_infobox.caption: Nowitzki in 2019
raw_infobox.highlights:
* List of NBA champions (2011 NBA Finals)
* Bill Russell NBA Finals Most Valuable Player Award (2011 NBA Finals)
* NBA Most Valuable Player Award (2006)
* 14× NBA All-Star (2002–2012, 2014, 2015, 2019)
* 4× All-NBA First Team (2004–2006, 2008)
* 5× All-NBA Second Team (2001, 2002, 2007, 2009, 2010)
* 3× All-NBA Third Team (2000, 2003, 2011)
* NBA Three-Point Contest champion (2006)
* NBA 75th Anniversary Team
* No. 41 Dallas Mavericks#Retired numbers
* Basketball Bundesliga MVP (1999)
* Basketball Bundesliga Top Scorer (1999)
* FIBA Basketball World Cup Most Valuable Player (2002 FIBA World Championship)
* FIBA EuroBasket MVP (EuroBasket 2005)
* FIBA EuroBasket 2000–2020 Dream Team (2020)
* 6× Euroscar Player of the Year (2002–2006, 2011)
* 2× FIBA Europe Men's Player of the Year Award (2005, 2011)
* Mr. Europa (2005)
* Silbernes Lorbeerblatt (2011)
* German Sports Personality of the Year (2011)
* Laureus Lifetime Achievement Award (2020)
* No. 14 retired by Germany men's national basketball team#Retired numbers
